# The `fwd_or_bidi_tag` Struct Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Helper which sets its type member to forward&#95;iterator&#95;tag if the category of <code>IterT</code> does not derive from bidirectional&#95;iterator&#95;tag, and to bidirectional&#95;iterator&#95;tag otherwise. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>template &lt;typename IterT&gt;
struct llvm::detail::fwd_or_bidi_tag&lt;IterT&gt;</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

Helper which sets its type member to forward&#95;iterator&#95;tag if the category of <code>IterT</code> does not derive from bidirectional&#95;iterator&#95;tag, and to bidirectional&#95;iterator&#95;tag otherwise.
